headline: ITC Infotech wins PTC Partner Network Award for FY25 in the PLM Category
summary: PARAMUS, N.J. & LONDON & BANGALORE, India, December 11, 2025--ITC Infotech has been awarded the PTC Partner Network Award for FY25 in the Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) category.

raw.headline: ITC Infotech wins PTC Partner Network Award for FY25 in the PLM Category
raw.summary: PARAMUS, N.J. & LONDON & BANGALORE, India, December 11, 2025--ITC Infotech has been awarded the PTC Partner Network Award for FY25 in the Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) category.

headline: PTC Arena AI Engine to Transform PLM & QMS With Intelligent Automation
summary: PTC's new Arena AI Engine brings AI-driven summaries, comparisons and compliance tools to boost product lifecycle and quality workflows.

raw.headline: PTC Arena AI Engine to Transform PLM & QMS With Intelligent Automation
raw.summary: PTC's new Arena AI Engine brings AI-driven summaries, comparisons and compliance tools to boost product lifecycle and quality workflows.

headline: PTC's Windchill+ Powering HOLON's Development of One of the World's First Automotive-Standard Level-4 EVs
summary: PTC (NASDAQ: PTC) today announced that HOLON, a subsidiary of the BENTELER Group, is using its Windchill+® product lifecycle management (PLM) software-as-a-service (SaaS) solution to help develop and bring to market an autonomous Level-4 electric vehicle (EV) that complies with automotive industry requirements.

raw.headline: PTC's Windchill+ Powering HOLON's Development of One of the World's First Automotive-Standard Level-4 EVs

headline: 1 Stock With Monster Upside to Buy as the AI Trade Enters Its Next Phase in 2026, According to Wall Street Analysts
summary: Software companies are integrating AI into their solutions, which will dramatically enhance the value added by these solutions.
